properties.name: animation-composition
properties.computedValue: list, each item a keyword as specified

properties.name: animation-timeline
properties.computedValue: list, each item either a case-sensitive css identifier or the keywords none, auto.

values.name: auto
values.prose: The animation’s timeline is a DocumentTimeline, more specifically the default document timeline.

values.name: none
values.prose: The animation is not associated with a timeline.

values.name: <custom-ident>
values.prose: If a named scroll progress timeline or view progress timeline is in scope on this element, use the referenced timeline as defined in Scroll-linked Animations § 4 Named Timeline Scoping. Otherwise the animation is not associated with a timeline.

values.name: <scroll()>
values.prose: Use the scroll progress timeline indicated by the given scroll() function. See Scroll-linked Animations § 2.1.1 The scroll() notation.

values.name: <view()>
values.prose: Use the view progress timeline indicated by the given view() function. See Scroll-linked Animations § 3.2.1 The view() notation.
